sentences.english: Earth people of "peaceful golden" cannot be realized in a country.
sentences.chinese: 地球人类之“太平盛世”无法在一国实现。

sentences.english: How can call earth human society has realized "peaceful golden"?
sentences.chinese: 怎样才能称之为地球人类社会实现了“太平盛世”呢？

sentences.english: Millennium Park is an extension of Chicago's Grant Park.
sentences.chinese: 太平盛世公园是对芝加哥格兰特公园的扩大。

sentences.english: Great country, decency and prosperous, at a time of peace and harmonious happy.
sentences.chinese: 泱泱大国，礼仪兴邦，时值和谐美满的太平盛世。

sentences.english: Hope during a trouble free year, there is still such understanding.
sentences.chinese: 希望在太平盛世的时候依然互相理解。

sentences.english: I led my country to the greatest prosperity that it has seen.
sentences.chinese: 朕将国家治理为前所未见的太平盛世。

sentences.english: Thus, originally good "peaceful golden" still can "peace"?
sentences.chinese: 如此一来，原本美好的“太平盛世”还能“太平”吗？

sentences.english: That is what we mean when we talk about it.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我们谈论的太平盛世的含义。
